name: WordSearch Story: Samuel's Adventure 1
description:
Once you’ve found all the words inside each WordSearch, the remaining letters form a sentence that furthers an overarching storyline.

Follow Samuel the pig on his adventure in chapter 1.

Features

- 30 puzzles (sized 10x10)

- 10 words per puzzle
- 1 discoverable sentence per puzzle
- Unlimited and unrestricted hints if you're stuck.
- All levels are unlocked from the start.
- 5 different fonts to choose from.
- Pick from 3 different colour themes, or choose your own entirely.
- Each puzzle earns an achievement
- Progress is always saved
